title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.12 - Protection of individuals from inadvertent intrusion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.12 - Protection of individuals from inadvertent intrusion

State Regulations

Design, operation and closure of the land disposal
facility must ensure protection of any individual inadvertently intruding into
the disposal site and occupying the site or contacting the waste at any time
after active institutional controls over the disposal site are
removed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
382.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
